properties.areaDesc: Wayne, WV; Cabell, WV; Lawrence, OH; Boyd, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 14 at 9:03PM EST until February 15 at 9:25PM EST by NWS Charleston WV
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio...
Kentucky...West Virginia...

Ohio River At Huntington affecting Wayne, Cabell, Boyd and
Lawrence Counties.

For the Ohio River...Minor flooding is forecast.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River At Huntington.
* Until Saturday evening.
* At 8:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 50.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 50.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest around 50.5
feet tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday.
* Impact...At 50.0 feet, West Virginia Route 2 at Glenwood is
flooded. Many low-lying sections near the river are flooded due to
backwater.
properties.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive
cars through flooded areas.

This warning will be in effect until the river falls below its flood
stage.

Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.

Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx.

The next statement is expected to be issued early Saturday morning.

NWSheadline: The Flood Warning is now in effect until late tomorrow evening
